nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Warriors of the Deep

The Clone Wars: Warriors of the Deep is a novel written by Rob Valois and first published by Grosset & Dunlap on October 27, 2011 in paperback. It is based on The Clone Wars: Season Four episodes "Water War", "Gungan Attack" and "Prisoners".

The beginning features a small prologue of Plo Koon speaking to Yoda aboard a Republic cruiser orbiting Iceberg III, a scene which is not depicted in the television series, but in the online game Clone Wars Adventure.
Warriors of the Deep adapted the The Clone Wars fourth season episodes Water War, Gungan Attack, and Prisoners.
On the cover Anakin Skywalker is seen with 2 lightsabers, one in his hand and one on his belt. But, in this story(and in other stories) Anakin never has more than one lightsaber.
